annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: EN
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Union
annotations.translation: 欧盟官方公报

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 316/2004
annotations.translation: 委员会 (EC) 第 316/2004 号条例

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: of 20 February 2004

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: amending Regulation (EC) No 753/2002 laying down certain rules for applying Council Regulation (EC) No 1493/1999 as regards the description, designation,  presentation and protection of certain wine sector products
annotations.translation: 修正 (EC) 第 753/2002 号条例，规定了适用理事会 (EC) 第 1493/1999 号条例的若干规则，涉及某些葡萄酒行业产品的描述、命名、展示和保护

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES,
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体委员会，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
annotations.translation: 考虑到《建立欧洲共同体条约》，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1493/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organisation of the market in wine (1), and in particular Articles 53 and 80 (b) thereof,
annotations.translation: 考虑到 1999 年 5 月 17 日关于葡萄酒市场共同组织的理事会 (EC) 第 1493/1999 号条例 (1)，特别是其中第 53 条和第 80(b) 条，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas:
annotations.translation: 鉴于：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (1) After Commission Regulation (EC) No 753/2002 (2) had been adopted it was found to contain some technical errors, which should be corrected. For the sake of clarity and consistency, some provisions of the Regulation should also be rearranged.
annotations.translation: (1) 在委员会 (EC) 第 753/2002 号条例 (2) 通过后，发现其中有一些技术性错误，应予纠正。为了明确和一致起见，条例的一些规定也应重新编排。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) Regulation (EC) No 753/2002 was notified to the World Trade Organisation. A number of wine-producing third countries entered reservations about the text. In the light of those comments, two consultations have been held in Geneva to explain the new rules on labelling and to listen to third countries' concerns.
annotations.translation: (2) (EC) 第 753/2002 号条例已通知世界贸易组织。一些葡萄酒生产国对文本持保留意见。就这些意见，在日内瓦举行了两次磋商，以解释关于标签的新规则并听取第三国的意见。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) Having regard to the claims by third countries, some changes should be made to Regulation (EC) No 753/2002. These involve opening the use of certain traditional terms to third countries provided that they fulfil equivalent conditions to those required from Member States. Furthermore, given that several third countries do not have the same level of centralised regulation as the Community, some requirements should be amended while at the same time ensuring the same guarantees as to the binding nature of those rules.
annotations.translation: (3) 考虑到第三国的要求，应对 (EC) 第 753/2002 号条例作一些修改，这包括向第三国开放使用某些传统术语，条件是这些国家必须满足成员国所应满足的同等条件。此外，鉴于有几个第三国没有与共同体相同水平的统一监管，应修正某些要求，同时确保这些规则的约束性得到同样的保证。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) Given the impossibility of finalising the adoption procedure for this measure before 1 February 2004, the time limit laid down in Article 47 should be extended to 15 March 2004.
annotations.translation: (4) 鉴于不可能在 2004 年 2 月 1 日之前完成这项措施的通过程序，第 47 条规定的期限应延长至 2004 年 3 月 15 日。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) Regulation (EC) No 753/2002 should be amended accordingly.
annotations.translation: (5) (EC) 第 753/2002 号条例应作相应修正。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (6) The Management Committee for Wine has not has not delivered an opinion within the time limit set by its chairman,
annotations.translation: (6) 葡萄酒管理委员会未在其主席规定的期限内发表意见，

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: OJ L 179, 14.7.1999, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No 1795/2003 (OJ L 262, 14.10.2003, p. 13).
annotations.translation: OJ L 179，1999 年 7 月 14 日，第 17 页。 经委员会 (EC) 第 1795/2003 号条例 (OJ L 262，2003 年 10 月 14 日，第 13 页) 最后修正的条例。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (2) OJ L 118 , 4.5.2002, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1205/2003 (OJ L 168 5.7.2003, p. 13).
annotations.translation: (2) OJ L 118，2002 年 5 月 4 日，第 1 页。经 (EC) 第 1205/2003 号条例（ OJ L 168，2003 年 7 月 5 日，第 13 页）最后修正的条例。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS REGULATION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下条例：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Regulation (EC) No 753/2002 is hereby amended as follows:
annotations.translation: (EC) 第 753/2002 号条例特此修正如下：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 1. in Article 5 (1) the second subparagraph is replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: 1. 第 5(1) 条中的第二分段替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 'Furthermore, the Member State concerned may provide for ad hoc derogations for certain quality wines psr and quality sparkling wines psr as referred to in Article 29 aged in bottles for a long period before sale , provided that they lay down control requirements and rules for circulation for those products.
annotations.translation: “此外，该成员国可规定对第 29 条所述在出售前长期置于瓶中之某些优质 psr 葡萄酒  和优质 psr 气泡酒的特别克减，但须规定这些产品的控制要求和流通规则。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Member States shall notify the Commission of the control requirements which they have laid down.';
annotations.translation: 成员国应将其规定的控制要求通知委员会。“；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 2. in Article 9, paragraphs 4 and 5 are deleted;
annotations.translation: 2. 已删除第 9 条第 4 和第 5 段；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 3. Article 12 (1)(b) is replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: 3. 第 12(1)(b) 条替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) Terms that are not defined in the Community rules but use of which is regulated in the Member State or conforms to the rules applicable to wine producers in the third country concerned, including those emanating from representative trade organisations, provided that they notify them to the Commission, which shall take all appropriate steps to ensure that those terms are publicised.';
annotations.translation: (b) 共同体规则中未定义，但其使用在成员国受到监管，或符合适用于有关第三国葡萄酒生产商规则的术语，包括来自有代表性的贸易组织的术语，条件是必须知会委员会，而委员会应采取一切适当措施确保这些术语的公布。“；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 4. Article 24 is amended as follows:
annotations.translation: 4. 第 24 条修正如下：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) in paragraph 5, the introductory phrase is replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: (a) 第 5 段中的介绍性短语由替换为下内容：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 'To qualify for inclusion in Annex III, a traditional term must:';
annotations.translation: ”传统术语要符合列入附件三的条件，则必须：“；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) paragraph 6 is deleted;
annotations.translation: (b) 已删除第 6 段；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) paragraph 8 is deleted;
annotations.translation: (c) 已删除第 8 段；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 5. the third paragraph of Article 28 is replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: 5. 第 28 条第三段替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 'The rules referred to in the second paragraph may, however, allow the term (traditional designation) to be used in conjunction with "..." (retsina) without necessarily being linked to a specified geographical indication.';
annotations.translation: “但是，第二段所述规则可能允许将（传统名称）一词与 “……” 一起使用 (retsina) 而不必与特定的地理标志相关联。”；
